CutSceneText.Text: Great. This kind person has offered to go with you as an escort.
You must do as you are told. Do you understand?
Of course. I want to give the lunch I made to Mr. [Ron] as soon as possible!
Czmoria! Why did you come to this dangerous place?
Ron! I came here to bring you the lunch I made.
Really? Thank you! But, how did you manage to get here?
This kind person brought me here!
Did I interrupt you from work?
Oh no, not at all. Then, should I take a breather and see what Czmoria made me for lunch?
